name: Hatshank Redemption
description:
"HatFilms are at 999,999 subscribers... but that means... Hey, Piri!"

"Yes sir?"

"Am I subscribed to HatFilms on my business account?"

"No sir."

"Do that now please."

"Subscribing..."

"..."

"..."

"...and?"

"I couldn't sir."

"What do you mean?"

"The server is actively rejecting my request."

"Hmm that's weird. I guess I'll have to deliver the request myself. Get me my nanosuit!"

In this game your aim is to get to the server modem to give hatfilms their 1 millionth subscriber. To do that you have to move through codeblocks avoid or kill YT firewall and get to the modem before you're timed out. 

WASD or arrows to move, leftmouse to shoot.

ESC to quit if it becomes too repetitive. 

Basically go right as much as you can, and then go up or down until you find the modem, the white diamond shape.

I wanted to add many more enemies and a boss fight but I just didn't have the time. Maybe I'll add those in the future.

You can play TheFatRat's Unity in the background, I didn't add it myself as it is free to use on youtube but may not be on twitch.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n8X9_MgEdCg

Hope you enjoy it. /u/rutiancoren on reddit..
